plot: Vallvidrera (Catalonia), 1902. The poet Jacint Verdaguer has just died. More than a century later, a young filmmaker is shooting a movie around Vil·la Joana, the manor where the poet passed his last days.
title: Extrema llum
plot_es: Vallvidrera (Catalonia), 1902. The poet Jacint Verdaguer has just died. More than a century later, a young filmmaker is shooting a movie around Vil·la Joana, the manor where the poet passed his last days.
